code: @Override public Outcome handle(Throwable failure) {     CountDownLatch latch = new CountDownLatch(1).     FileSystemWatcher watcher = this.fileSystemWatcherFactory.getFileSystemWatcher().     watcher.addSourceFolders(new ClassPathFolders(Restarter.getInstance().getInitialUrls())).     watcher.addListener(new Listener(latch)).     watcher.start().     try {         latch.await().     } catch (InterruptedException ex) {         Thread.currentThread().interrupt().     }     return Outcome.RETRY. }
